title: Blended Learning Course Based on Science MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Hybrid operation of real-time video lectures and MOOC content using learner-owned devices (BYOD). Combines intermediate-level science theory with practical projects

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core theories in science (e.g., chemical reactions/biological classification) with over 80% accuracy through MOOC content
In blended environments, collaborative projects with peer learners can be completed to design science experiments
The ability to systematically present scientific research findings is enhanced through online discussions and real-time feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
